title: Consider all your options
content:
Before you choose a medical plan, it's critical that you do your research:
路 Ensure your home address is up to date. Find the link on W Connect or on StoreNet > Tools > Applications > People Central.
路 Verify that your providers participate in the network for each option by using the Provider Search tool when you enroll for coverage on the Benefits Support Center.
路 Confirm the network hospitals and facilities in your area.
路 Keep in mind: If you are enrolling in a UHC network that requires you to designate a primary care physician (PCP) for yourself and your covered family members, you'll be prompted to do so when you enroll. If you need to change your PCP after you enroll, you'll need to contact UHC directly. In UHC markets where there is tiering, Tier 2 providers will cost you more.
